title: Does the applying patches really take this long?
body: So today is my 6th day of trying to download LoL on my laptop. Yesterday i downloaded a new installer and its been going well so far. I woke up this morning and it was at 50% and applying patches. Its been 7+ hours and it's still at 50% applying patches. I saw another forum and i checked if it was frozen. It's not. Its currently 5:16pm and in my patcher file the last time it got another log was at 3:07pm. Is it working? Is it broken? or is it just taking a while to do its thing?

replies.body:
It sounds like your computer's connection to our patching servers is pretty unstable. I'd recommend ensuring your network settings are up to spec by working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it covers some common misconfigurations that conflict with League.

Let me know if those steps were able to assist you in resolving this issue.
